700340f-b.text:
(1)
West 227th Street, at Independence Ave., showing the Henry Hudson Monument. In the background appears, under construction, the Francis
Schervier Home and Hospital (annex).
May 25, 1937.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
A view of the south side of the Francis Schervier Home and Hospital.
May 25, 1937.
P. L. Sperr.
